file_content.text: My eyes are still adjusting, but I have no trouble recognizing you, brave Xerender. The sight warms me.
Master Wyellett, your ordeal has ended. I only wish I'd heard you reaching out to me sooner.
Do not denigrate yourself. It took great concentration to summon you.
All these many years, entombed in this rubble, I have fed off the Force and have great insights to impart.
Your insights will fall on dead ears.
It will be useless.
This should be good. I can't wait to hear it.
Regale us all.
I've finally caught up to you, Xerender.
At last.
What's this? I sense a presence. Baras...
Indeed. This is Darth Baras's apprentice, come to stop me from returning you to your command.
Conserve your strength, Master. My men and I will dispatch this interloper.
You can't beat me.
Strong words from someone so drastically outnumbered.
I seek a peaceful solution.
No need for bloodshed.
So, you realize how drastically outnumbered you are.
I see you've managed to tame that sadistic Talz. It won't help you.
There's a Republic cell awaiting you, Sith.
Xerender, wait---
It ends now. [Attack.]
To arms, men. Protect Master Wyellett at all costs!
